CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(FluidRecipeId__c)), IF ( AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(ProductCatalogue__r.Category__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(ProductCatalogue__r.Category__r.FluidViewImage__c)) ), $Setup.ProductSettings__c.FluidPictureUrl__c + FluidRecipeId__c + '/image/' + ProductCatalogue__r.Category__r.FluidViewImage__c + '.jpg', $Setup.ProductSettings__c.FluidPictureUrl__c + FluidRecipeId__c + '/image/Front.jpg' ), '' )
CustomField.label: Image Front Url
